definition.name: RootDocument
definition.purpose: Provides the root HTML document structure and layout for the app
definition.description: A layout component that wraps the application in a standard HTML document structure, including <html>, <head>, and <body> tags. It injects Tanstack Router's HeadContent and Scripts, and renders the current route's content via Outlet.

visible: HTML structure with route content in body

effects: The current route's component tree is rendered inside the document body via Outlet

definition.visualLayout: Standard HTML document with head and body. HeadContent injects meta tags and links. Body contains the Outlet and Scripts.
definition.implementationNotes: Used as the root layout for all routes. Integrates Tanstack Router's HeadContent, Scripts, and Outlet for SSR/CSR. Uses createRootRouteWithContext for context injection.
